com.ephesoft.dcma.core.util

Class DOMUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.core.util.DOMUtil

  • public final class DOMUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility to perform DOM operations on an Object. This utility can be used to perform DOM operations, marshaling/unmarshaling a DOM object

    This DOM utility can be used to marshal/unmarshal jdom, w3c Document.

    Author:
    Ephesoft.

    • Method Detail

      • marshalJDOMDocument

        public static org.jdom.Document marshalJDOMDocument(JAXB2Template jaxbTemplate,
                                    java.lang.Object objectToMarshal)
        Marshals the Object as an JDOM Document. If creates an in-memory marshaling of the Object. This approach will avoid extra IO-Operation by converting the Object from one form to another.
        Parameters:
        jaxbTemplate - JAXB2Template which stores the context of the marshaller. It also ensures that in memory transactions are not encrypted befor processing.
        objectToMarshal - Object the object which needs to be marshaled. The schema for the object should be provided in the context of the marshaler.
        Returns:
        Document which is an in-memory JDOM representation of the object.

      • convertToW3CDocument

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document convertToW3CDocument(org.jdom.Document jdomDocument)
                                                 throws org.jdom.JDOMException
        API that converts JDOM Document to the W3C document. This is an in-memory transaction of converting jdom document to the W3C document.
        Parameters:
        jdomDocument - Document which needs to be converted.
        Returns:
        Document w3c dom representation of the JDOM document.
        Throws:
        org.jdom.JDOMException - When the Document cannot be converted.

      • convertToJDOMDocument

        public static org.jdom.Document convertToJDOMDocument(org.w3c.dom.Document w3cDocument)
        API that converts W3C Document to the JDOM document. This is an in-memory transaction of converting w3c document to the JDOM document.
        Parameters:
        w3cDocument{@link - org.w3c.dom.Document} which needs to be converted.
        Returns:
        Document jdom representation of the W3C document.

      • marshalW3CDocument

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document marshalW3CDocument(JAXB2Template jaxbTemplate,
                                      java.lang.Object objectToMarshal)
                                               throws org.jdom.JDOMException
        Marshals the Object as an W3CDocument. If creates an in-memory marshaling of the Object. This approach will avoid extra IO-Operation by converting the Object from one form to another.
        Parameters:
        jaxbTemplate - JAXB2Template which stores the context of the marshaller. It also ensures that in memory transactions are not encrypted before processing.
        objectToMarshal - Object the object which needs to be marshaled. The schema for the object should be provided in the context of the marshaler.
        Returns:
        Document which is an in-memory W3C representation of the object.
        Throws:
        org.jdom.JDOMException
